i-p9lWIhcLQ-2.description: Sam doesn’t agree with Orion’s approach

JTie0S_5gjE-2.description: Vax goes to steal some wine while Scanlan doesn't distract

kGxiZNbjwGI-1.description: Laura gets to the episode a bit late, just in time for an elaborate and extremely well-thought-out plan to go into play.

QDdT5UqGaDw-1.description: Grog mopes after a rough fight.

60sUkTh6xBc-1.description: Matt gets a subtle revenge after Percy absolutely wrecks shop with multiple natural twenties… while wearing buttflap pajamas.

IW6GgFQg3kk-1.description: Mary Elizabeth McGlynn has a helluva moment as Zahra during a particularly nasty fight in her first-ever D&D game.

FM6L4tuyXq0-1.description: Matt invents Victor the blackpowder merchant on the spot.

kre27f30IVs-1.description: The party refuses to let Percy face the Briarwoods alone.

kre27f30IVs-2.description: Vax gets revenge on Grog for tripping him several months ago.

yrrB_q-V8G0-2.description: Vex charges in with the most dramatic dice rolls possible.

yE27NwtXjPY-1.description: The show takes on a distinctly different and more disturbing tone. Welcome to Whitestone.

2AqLu-u-GcY-2.description: To quote an earlier post: the walls are people and magic is dead. Everything is fine.

WFbmY79Qdfc-1.description: Scanlan casts a spell on Percy.

EikRMYRf5-Y-1.description: Percy gives Grog a sentient sword. What could go wrong?

EikRMYRf5-Y-2.description: Keyleth, Scanlan, and Percy take in a magic show during the festival. They’re… still a little frazzled.

wCj4kCq1Z9Y-1.description: Scanlan’s flirtatious relationship with Kaylie takes a dramatic turn.

0W_by9hT6VQ-1.description: The party starts to fracture under the strain.

KHsA0R_GovU-1.description: Matt is DMing a room full of twelve-year-olds.

KHsA0R_GovU-2.description: Half the party’s character arcs turn on a single roll of the dice…

QqU5pqKoH2c-1.description: Vex seeks help with a magical artifact.

QqU5pqKoH2c-2.description: Vax and Grog slip into nightmares.

1uMH-hFJz0Q-1.description: Vex does some flying target practice over breakfast. Things escalate.

PfvVssT83MU-1.description: Grog escapes the portal in the most heartbreaking possible way.

9g3cnEacrEo-1.description: Scanlan coaches Kaylie through a distraction.

8xpnCiF4im0-1.description: Grog gets his hands on a magical artifact. Experimentation ensues.

8xpnCiF4im0-2.description: Percy and Keyleth talk about cities and lifespans. Unbelievably good improv.

HMBS__TC5R4-2.description: Vax has an unexpected late-night visitor.

nRBzpiPccOs-1.description: Scanlan to the rescue. (”I don’t do these things!”)

l_jwMsIv1oc-1.description: Percy has a couple of late-night conversations after a charm wears off.

Ok4ZW9cNupc-1.description: Vox Machina is a close-knit group.

ir5UUH1VeD4-1.description: Saundor and Vex. Link is to the fixed audio, because the background music times up perfectly and it’s a little uncanny.

6-Od2lnsiHs-1.description: The perils of mist-walking in a desert environment.

6-Od2lnsiHs-2.description: Scanlan looks for someone to help him out with a drug deal.

Z7ozVxDtJzM-1.description: Keyleth, the airship, and the storm.

qn8tLbXWAtc-1.description: Vex and Percy talk about forgiveness.

2U21dJrY6ZI-1.description: Cenokir introduces himself. Things get a little weird.

um3mkvNmDPY-1.description: Grog finds a famous (infamous) D&D magical item.
